about.value: I am Eric, a full-stack software developer.

apod.help: displays the NASA astronomy picture of the day
apod.title: Title

contact.help: displays some contact information about root

date.help: displays the current date and time

echo.help: write arguments to the standard output

github.help: displays the GitHub profile link of root

location.help: displays the current location information by clients ip address

qrcode.help: generate a qrcode for a given url e.g. 'qrcode https://google.com/'

weather.help: displays the current weather at given location e.g. 'weather Berlin'

whoami.value: I can't tell you who you are, but I can tell you who I am. Try the 'about' command.
